skill.name: Acrobatics
entries: Stay on your feet in a tricky situation, or perform an acrobatic stunt.

skill.name: Animal Handling
entries: Calm or train an animal, or get an animal to behave in a certain way.

skill.name: Arcana
entries: Recall lore about spells, magic items, and the planes of existence.

skill.name: Athletics
entries: Jump farther than normal, stay afloat in rough water, or break something.

skill.name: Deception
entries: Tell a convincing lie, or wear a disguise convincingly.

skill.name: History
entries: Recall lore about historical events, people, nations, and cultures.

skill.name: Insight
entries: Discern a person's mood and intentions.

skill.name: Intimidation
entries: Awe or threaten someone into doing what you want.

skill.name: Investigation
entries: Find obscure information in books, or deduce how something works.

skill.name: Medicine
entries: Diagnose an illness, or determine what killed the recently slain.

skill.name: Nature
entries: Recall lore about terrain, plants, animals, and weather.

skill.name: Perception
entries: Using a combination of senses, notice something that's easy to miss.

skill.name: Performance
entries: Act, tell a story, perform music, or dance.

skill.name: Persuasion
entries: Honestly and graciously convince someone of something.

skill.name: Religion
entries: Recall lore about gods, religious rituals, and holy symbols.

skill.name: Sleight of Hand
entries: Pick a pocket, conceal a handheld object, or perform legerdemain.

skill.name: Stealth
entries: Escape notice by moving quietly and hiding behind things.

skill.name: Survival
entries: Follow tracks, forage, find a trail, or avoid natural hazards.
